meanings.definition: A person who is enrolled in a program or organization.
meanings.sent1: The school had many enrollees in the art class.
meanings.sent2: The enrollees received their student IDs on the first day.
meanings.sent3: The enrollees in the cooking class were excited to learn new recipes.
meanings.sent4: The enrollees in the fitness program were like eager athletes ready to train.
meanings.sent5: The enrollees formed a diverse group of learners with different interests.

meanings.definition: The group of individuals who have enrolled in a particular program or organization.
meanings.sent1: All the enrollees gathered for the orientation session.
meanings.sent2: The enrollees' names were listed on the notice board.
meanings.sent3: The enrollees in the book club shared a love for reading.
meanings.sent4: The enrollees in the dance class moved gracefully like a synchronized team.
meanings.sent5: The enrollees' enthusiasm made the event lively and engaging.
